You get the rebate from the offset from selling price? Or during deregister
the 45k deduction is given when u purchase new vehicle

when u buy a new car  u will see the ves rebate 25k  and EEAi 20k rebate so total is 45k rebate  off the arf taxes. so example i use an bmw 330 arf is $54640  + $15000 ves surcharge  and it will be a total $69640 arf  but if it is an ev  the arf will be $54640 - $45000 instead and it is only $9640  so u buy an ice u pay $69640 arf  but u buy ev u pay $9640  this is a huge difference espcailly if you got loan for the car
